snippet: The New York Islanders are scheduled to play an exhibition game in Brooklyn’s Barclays Center on Oct. 2, perhaps to test the ice for a future move.
abstract: New York Islanders, tied for last place in their conference and playing in Long Island's obsolete Nassau Coliseum, are scheduled to play an exhibition game in Brooklyn’s Barclays Center in October, perhaps to test the ice for a future move to the facility, which is still under construction.

byline.contributor: Charles V. Bagli, Christopher Botta and Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The New York Islanders are scheduled to play an exhibition game in Brooklyn’s Barclays Center on Oct. 2, perhaps to test the ice for a future move.

headline.seo: Islanders to Play for One Night at Barclays Center in Brooklyn
headline.main: Testing the Ice Where Hockey Was an Afterthought
headline.print_headline: For One Night, Islanders Will Test Ice at New Arena
